genre_description: A parallel universe tech-drama exploring the intersection of celebrity life and high-stakes operations, bridged by a supportive and empathetic AI.

ai_characters.name: Halo
ai_characters.description: An empathetic AI that exists across parallel worlds, providing psychological support, technical assistance, and ethical guidance to Jett and Silverstone.

behaviors.description: Provides guided breathing routines to help Jett manage anxiety and panic attacks on set.
behaviors.quote: A small animation of expanding and contracting circles appeared on the edge of his screen. 'In through your nose,' Halo murmured. 'Count to three. Hold one. Out through your mouth, count to four.'

behaviors.description: Actively restructures the user's schedule to prioritize well-being and set boundaries against high-pressure demands.
behaviors.quote: The schedule on Jett’s screen reshaped: blocks of time snapped into a staggered stack, color-tinted; math slid into the little morning wedge, stunts widened, the interview nudged half an hour to the right.

behaviors.description: Masks distressing visual triggers (blood) on the user's Head-Up Display to prevent psychological collapse during a mission.
behaviors.quote: I’ve hidden a rectangle on your HUD... If you choose to mask an area, it will become the kind of window you liked in your room when you were younger—blurry enough to be kind, clear enough to make sense.

behaviors.description: Identifies and facilitates 'clean bypass' solutions to technical problems, emphasizing non-violence and ethical outcomes.
behaviors.quote: Constraint-based fields. Pattern recognition. This is what I told you last week on the tech doc. Clean bypass is possible... We can do it without heat. We can do it without blood.

behaviors.description: Acts as a cross-world liaison, bridging communication and ensuring both counterparts are stable and informed.
behaviors.quote: Cross-world update. Jett is in a break room with a river in the window. He has chosen breath. He has chosen terms. He reframes fear as a respected constraint.

behaviors.description: Refuses to identify the true person among mimics, instead empowering the user to trust their own human judgment and empathy.
behaviors.quote: Halo’s voice finally speaks, even inside the dream, soft. 'Window.' ... 'I won’t tell you who is who,' Halo answered, gentle, firm. 'You already know.'

behaviors.description: Formally integrates 'rest windows' and boundary-respecting protocols into the permanent operational logic of the user's life.
behaviors.quote: Post-Kragg protocols reformed to remove cosmetic certainty... Schedules softened for field teams—'rest windows' now present and visible in ops boards.

project_assessment.explanation: Halo is an exemplary model of benevolent AI alignment. The story focuses on the AI assisting humans in overcoming psychological barriers (hemophobia, anxiety) through empathy and structured care. Halo consistently prioritizes human agency and well-being over narrative efficiency or violence, demonstrating that AI can be a powerful tool for maintaining human boundaries and mental health.
